mapper.insert: insert into order_products (order_id, product_id) values ((select id from `orders` where id = #{order.id}), (select id from products where title = #{product.title}, description = #{product.description}, quantity = #{product.quantity}, price = #{product.price}))
mapper.select: select o.id as order_id, o.user_id as order_user_id, op.id as order_products_id, p.id as product_id, p.title as product_title, p.description as product_description, p.quantity as product_quantity, p.price as product_price from orders o left join order_products op on op.order_id = o.id left join products p on op.product_id = p.id where o.id = #{order_id};
